mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_blog ( blog_id, user_id, user_nickname, title, content, content_html, category_id, category_name, is_hide, summary, create_time, update_time ) values (#{blogId},#{userId},#{userNickname},#{title},#{content},#{contentHtml},#{categoryId}, #{categoryName},#{isHide},#{summary},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_blog set
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
content_html = #{contentHtml},
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_name = #{categoryName},
is_hide = #{isHide},
summary = #{summary},
view_num = #{viewNum},
like_num = #{likeNum},
comment_num = #{commentNum},
blog_status = #{blogStatus},
check_comment = #{checkComment},
check_time = #{checkTime},
blog_id = #{blogId} where blog_id = #{blogId}
update t_blog set comment_num = comment_num + 1 where blog_id = #{blogId}
